name: CODE D'AZUR
description:
CODE D’AZUR is a creative digital agency. With roots in digital production, and a solid team of advertising minded people, we create anything from digital campaigns to services and products. We believe brands need to stand out by surprising people with unconventional ideas that add value to their lives. And that those ideas have to fit into people’s context; into the technology they use, how they behave and the values they share. Standing out requires top notch creativity and design.
Fitting in requires clear strategic insights and leading-edge technical knowledge. That is why at CODE D’AZUR we merge Creativity, Strategy and Technology. Creative technologists, developers, designers, UX’ers, strategists and creatives. All under one roof.
